summary: Tested smart features for invoicing and ledger app: Global Search, Admin Dashboard, Customer List, Order Creation with customer auto-complete. All features working correctly. FIXED login redirect bug.
critical_code_review_comments: GlobalSearch.jsx: data-testid='global-search-input' is on TextField wrapper, not the input element. Consider adding data-testid to the actual input for easier testing.
seed_data_creation: Used existing seed data: 3 products (Rice, Wheat, Sugar), 2 customers (Rajesh Kumar ₹1000 balance, Suresh Sharma ₹500 opening balance), 2 suppliers (ABC Traders, XYZ Wholesale ₹1000 opening balance), 2 orders (INV/2025-26/0001 cash ₹500, INV/2025-26/0002 credit ₹1000)
context_for_next_testing_agent: All smart features tested and working: Global Search (Ctrl+K), Admin Dashboard with data integrity panel, Customer list with balance display, Order creation with customer auto-complete showing due amounts. Fixed login redirect bug - now navigates to /orders after successful login.

tests.search_customers: PASS - Searching 'Rajesh' shows customer results with balance

tests.data_integrity: PASS - Shows 'All Good' with green checkmark
tests.recent_sales: PASS - Shows both orders with correct status (paid/unpaid)
tests.quick_actions: PASS - All 6 buttons present and clickable

tests.customer_display: PASS - Shows Rajesh Kumar and Suresh Sharma
tests.quick_actions: PASS - New Sale, View Ledger, View Details, Delete buttons present

tests.cash_sale_toggle: PASS - CASH SALE (Paid) toggle visible and functional
tests.customer_autocomplete: PASS - Shows customers with due amounts (e.g., 'Rajesh Kumar - Due: ₹1,000')
tests.customer_fields: PASS - Customer Name and Mobile fields present

tests.redirect_after_login: PASS - Now redirects to /orders after successful login

features_verified: Global search functionality - search for orders, customers, suppliers using Ctrl+K
Dashboard displays correct receivable (₹1,500), payable (₹1,000), today's sales (₹1,500), and net position (₹500)
Data integrity panel shows 'All Good' when data is properly linked
Order creation with customer auto-complete showing balance
Credit sale creates customer record and updates balance
Login redirect to /orders after successful authentication

bugs_fixed_during_testing.issue: After successful login, page did not redirect - user had to manually navigate
bugs_fixed_during_testing.fix: Added useNavigate hook and navigate('/orders', { replace: true }) after successful login and setupAdmin calls
bugs_fixed_during_testing.impact: Users can now login and be automatically redirected to the orders page
